subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: During the N.C.A.A. men’s tournament the Huskies have made 88 percent of their free throws, with some help from a video of N.B.A. player Steve Nash.
snippet: During the N.C.A.A. men’s tournament the Huskies have made 88 percent of their free throws, with some help from a video of N.B.A. player Steve Nash.
